con:part.con:content: <definitions targetNamespace="urn:switchyard-services:ticketservice:1.0" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="urn:switchyard-services:ticketservice:1.0" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/"> <types> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="urn:switchyard-services:ticketservice:1.0" schemaLocation="http://localhost:8080/ticketservice/TicketService?xsd=TicketTypes.xsd"/> </xsd:schema> </types> <message name="submitTicket"> <part element="tns:submitTicket" name="parameters"></part> </message> <portType name="TicketService"> <operation name="submitTicket"> <input message="tns:submitTicket"></input> </operation> </portType> <binding name="TicketServiceBinding" type="tns:TicketService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <operation name="submitTicket"> <soap:operation soapAction="urn:switchyard-services:ticketservice:1.0"/> <input> <soap:body use="literal"/> </input> </operation> </binding> <service name="TicketService"> <port binding="tns:TicketServiceBinding" name="TicketServicePort"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/ticketservice/TicketService"/> </port> </service> </definitions>

<xs:schema targetNamespace="urn:switchyard-services:ticketservice:1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="urn:switchyard-services:ticketservice:1.0"> <xs:element name="submitTicket" type="tns:submitTicketType"/> <xs:complexType name="submitTicketType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="customer" type="tns:customerType"/> <xs:element name="service" type="tns:serviceType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="customerType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="customerCode" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="areaCode" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="serviceType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="serviceName" type="tns:serviceNameType"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="problemDescription" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="1" minOccurs="0" name="urgent" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="serviceNameType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="internet"/> <xs:enumeration value="cable"/> <xs:enumeration value="tel"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> </xs:schema>
